title: Google\Cloud\Retail\V2\Rule\RedirectAction
name: RedirectAction
description:
Redirects a shopper to a specific page.

  • Rule Condition:
    • Must specify [Condition.query_terms][google.cloud.retail.v2.Condition.query_terms].
  • Action Input: Request Query
  • Action Result: Redirects shopper to provided uri.
